articles.author: Divya Patil, Matthew Burgess
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for November 17 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asia stocks fell Friday, as Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. led Chinese companies lower after the e-commerce leader walked back plans to spin off and list its $11 billion cloud business.
articles.content:
Asia stocks fell Friday, as Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. led Chinese companies lower after the e-commerce leader walked back plans to spin off and list its $11 billion cloud business.
